The paper discusses the challenge of distinguishing between AI-generated and human-written text in the context of academic assignments.

The paper discusses the ability of a machine learning model to accurately distinguish between original human and ChatGPT-generated text, especially when the text is short. The study focuses on short online reviews and compares human-generated and ChatGPT-generated text. The ML model achieves an accuracy of 79% in detecting ChatGPT-generated text.
